faqs.how can i apply for a job: You can apply directly through our Careers Page by selecting the role you’re interested in and clicking “Apply Now”. Once you submit your CV and details, our recruitment team will review your application and contact you if you are shortlisted.
faqs.can i apply for more than one position: Absolutely! If you feel you’re suitable for multiple roles, you’re welcome to apply for more than one. Just make sure each application matches your skills and experience.
faqs.what documents do i need to submit: You will need to upload your updated CV. We also encourage you to include a cover letter and links to your portfolio or LinkedIn profile, especially for technical roles.
faqs.how will i know if my application was re: Once your application is successfully submitted, you will receive an email confirmation. You may also receive a message from RecruIT acknowledging your submission.
faqs.can i apply without experience: Yes! We welcome applications from fresh graduates and candidates from different industries. Some roles are specifically designed for entry-level applicants.
faqs.do i need a degree: A degree is beneficial but not mandatory for all roles. We value skills, creativity, and practical experience. Certifications or strong project portfolios are great substitutes.
faqs.what are the basic qualifications needed: To apply for any position, you should meet the educational and experience requirements mentioned in the job ad. For starter roles, a diploma or degree in the relevant field is preferred.
faqs.are there age or experience limits: No age limits! Some roles may require specific experience levels — senior roles usually require 3–5 years, while internships are open to fresh graduates.
faqs.how can i know if i meet the qualificati: Each job posting includes a list of required qualifications and skills. Compare your background to the job description — if you meet most requirements, go ahead and apply!
faqs.are professional qualifications required: Not always! Qualifications like CIMA, ACCA, PMP, or HRM Diplomas are advantages but not mandatory unless mentioned in the job post.
faqs.does the company provide training: Yes! Our Learning & Development team offers programs to help employees fill skill gaps and grow in their roles.
faqs.what is the current status of my job app: You can check your application status by logging into your candidate profile on our Careers Portal and viewing the 'My Applications' section.
faqs.how long does feedback take after interv: Typically, feedback is given within 7–10 working days after your interview, but it may vary depending on the position.
faqs.will i be notified if not selected: Yes, all candidates are informed once the recruitment process for that role is complete.
faqs.can i request interview feedback: Yes! You can reply to your interview email or contact HR via the Careers Portal to request feedback.
faqs.my application is under review: ‘Under Review’ means your application is still being evaluated by our hiring team or manager. It may take longer during busy recruitment periods.
faqs.can i update my resume: Yes, you can update your profile before the job posting closes. Afterward, you can submit a new application with your updated details.
faqs.can i apply again: Absolutely! You’re always welcome to apply for other roles that match your skills or join our talent pool for future opportunities.
